item.title: About Me
item.description: 👨‍💻 All of my projects are available at https://dhruvbhirud.github.io/ 📝 I regularly write articles on https://dhruvbhirud.github.io/ 📫 How to reach me bhiruddhruv@gmail.com 📄 Know about my experiences https://dhruvbhirud.github.io/
